rfps.issued_by: Power Grid Corporation of India Ltd (PGCIL)
rfps.project_overview: Power Grid Corporation of India Ltd (PGCIL) invites sealed tenders from qualified and experienced cable manufacturers for the supply of Low Tension (LT) distribution cables as part of its distribution network modernization program across twelve (12) districts under Region-5. The project aims to improve reliability, efficiency, and safety of the low-voltage distribution infrastructure.
rfps.scope_of_supply: 3.5 Core LT Distribution Cables (0.4 kV) Quantity: 500 meters Conductor Size: 50 mm² Material: Aluminum (Copper alternative acceptable) Insulation: PVC No. of Cores: 3.5 cores (3 power + 1 earth) Armoring: None Rated Voltage: 0.4 kV Temperature Rating: 70°C 4 Core LT Distribution Cables (0.4 kV) Quantity: 1000 meters Conductor Size: 16 mm² Material: Copper Insulation: PVC No. of Cores: 4 cores Armoring: None Rated Voltage: 0.4 kV Temperature Rating: 70°C
rfps.technical_specifications: Indian Standards: IS 1554 International Standards: Certification: BIS mandatory
rfps.testing_requirements: Pre-Delivery Tests Routine insulation test Acceptance testing Type testing (if required) Documentation and certification On-Site Tests Test Cost (₹) Routine Insulation Test 8,000 Acceptance Testing 12,000 Type Test (if required) 20,000 Documentation and Certification 5,000 Total Estimated Cost: ₹45,000
rfps.delivery_timeline: Order Placement: Manufacturing Lead Time: days Delivery Date: Installation Completion:
rfps.evaluation_criteria: Technical Compliance: Mandatory Delivery Capability: Required Price Weightage: 40% Certification: BIS mandatory After-Sales Support: 5 years
rfps.submission_format: Submission Mode: Sealed bid Technical proposal with compliance statement Commercial proposal with detailed pricing schedule Product datasheets and test certificates Company profile and statutory certifications Performance guarantee (2% of total contract value)

rfps.projectName: Four Laning of NH-44 (Bengaluru to Chennai)
rfps.project_overview: The National Highway Authority of India (NHAI) invites sealed bids from eligible Original Equipment Manufacturers (OEMs) for the supply of High Voltage Cables for the Four Laning project of NH-44 (Bengaluru to Chennai). The project covers approximately 250 km and includes toll booths, weighment stations, traffic management centers, and emergency communication systems.
rfps.scope_of_supply: High Voltage Power Cables (1.1 kV) Quantity: 1000 meters Conductor Size: 240 mm² Material: Copper Insulation: XLPE No. of Cores: 4 Armoring: Steel tape Rated Voltage: 1.1 kV Temperature Rating: 90°C Medium Voltage Cables (0.6 kV) Quantity: 500 meters Conductor Size: 185 mm² Material: Copper Insulation: XLPE No. of Cores: 3 Armoring: Steel wire Rated Voltage: 0.6 kV Temperature Rating: 90°C Low Voltage Distribution Cables (0.4 kV) Quantity: 2000 meters Conductor Size: 50 mm² Material: Copper Insulation: PVC No. of Cores: 2 Armoring: None Rated Voltage: 0.4 kV Temperature Rating: 70°C
rfps.technical_specifications: Indian Standards: IS 1554 Part 1, IS 1554 Part 2 International Standards: IEC 60228, IEC 60502-1 Certification: BIS mandatory
rfps.testing_requirements: Pre-Delivery Tests Routine tests on 100% production Type tests on certified samples Material certificates On-Site Tests Test Cost (₹) High Voltage Withstand Test 25,000 Insulation Resistance Measurement 12,000 Tensile Strength Verification 18,000 Mechanical Installation Inspection 15,000 Documentation and Certification 10,000 Total Estimated Cost: ₹80,000
rfps.delivery_timeline: Order Placement: 2025-01-05 Manufacturing Lead Time: 45 days Delivery Date: 2025-02-20 Installation Completion: 2025-03-10
rfps.pricing_details: High Voltage Cable – per meter Medium Voltage Cable – per meter Low Voltage Cable – per meter Testing Cost: ₹80,000 Warranty: 2 years
rfps.evaluation_criteria: Technical Compliance: Mandatory Delivery Capability: Required Price Weightage: 40% Certification: BIS mandatory After-Sales Support: 5 years
rfps.submission_format: Submission Mode: Sealed bid Technical proposal with compliance matrix Commercial proposal with pricing schedule Product datasheets and test certificates Company profile and credentials Bank guarantee (5% of order value)

rfps.projectName: Underground Metro Rail Expansion – Corridor A
rfps.project_overview: The Metro Rail Corporation invites sealed bids from eligible cable manufacturers for the supply of HT and LT power cables for traction substations, underground stations, and tunnel electrical systems under the Underground Metro Rail Expansion – Corridor A project. The scope includes traction power substations, underground metro stations, tunnel electrical systems, and auxiliary power distribution networks.
rfps.scope_of_supply: HT Power Cables (11 kV) Quantity: 1200 meters Conductor Size: 300 mm² Material: Copper Insulation: XLPE No. of Cores: 3 cores Armoring: Steel wire Rated Voltage: 11 kV Temperature Rating: 90°C LT Auxiliary Cables (1.1 kV) Quantity: 900 meters Conductor Size: 35 mm² Material: Copper Insulation: PVC No. of Cores: 4 cores Armoring: None Rated Voltage: 1.1 kV Temperature Rating: 70°C
rfps.technical_specifications: Indian Standards: IS 7098 International Standards: IEC 60502 Certification: BIS mandatory
rfps.testing_requirements: Pre-Delivery Tests Routine tests on 100% of production Type tests on certified samples Material certificates for all components Fire resistance testing certificates On-Site Tests Test Cost (₹) High Voltage Test 20,000 Insulation Resistance Test 10,000 Documentation and Certification 8,000 Total Estimated Cost: ₹38,000
rfps.delivery_timeline: Order Placement: 2025-02-10 Manufacturing Lead Time: 50 days Delivery Date: 2025-04-10 Installation Completion: 2025-05-05
rfps.pricing_details: Warranty: Standard 3-year warranty against manufacturing defects
rfps.evaluation_criteria: Technical Compliance: Mandatory Delivery Capability: Required Price Weightage: 40% Certification: BIS mandatory After-Sales Support: years
rfps.submission_format: Submission Mode: Sealed bid Technical proposal with compliance matrix Commercial proposal with detailed pricing schedule Product datasheets and test certificates Company profile and certifications Bank guarantee (5% of total order value)

rfps.project_overview: The Airport Authority of India invites sealed bids from eligible cable manufacturers for the supply of electrical power and control cables for airport terminal expansion works. The project includes terminal lighting systems, baggage handling systems, security and surveillance installations, and passenger boarding bridge power supply infrastructure.
rfps.scope_of_supply: LT Power Cables (1.1 kV) Quantity: 1800 meters Conductor Size: 185 mm² Material: Copper Insulation: XLPE No. of Cores: 4 cores Armoring: Steel tape Rated Voltage: 1.1 kV Temperature Rating: 90°C Control Cables (0.6 kV) Quantity: 700 meters Conductor Size: 1.5 mm² Material: Copper Insulation: PVC No. of Cores: 12 cores Armoring: None Rated Voltage: 0.6 kV Temperature Rating: 70°C
rfps.technical_specifications: Indian Standards: IS 1554 International Standards: IEC 60227, IEC 60502, IEC 60331 Certification: BIS mandatory
rfps.testing_requirements: Pre-Delivery Tests Routine tests on 100% of production Type tests on certified samples Material certificates for all components Fire resistance test certificates On-Site Tests Test Cost (₹) Electrical Tests 14,000 Mechanical Inspection 10,000 Documentation and Certification 6,000 Total Estimated Cost: ₹30,000
rfps.delivery_timeline: Order Placement: 2025-03-05 Manufacturing Lead Time: 35 days Delivery Date: 2025-04-20 Installation Completion: 2025-05-15
rfps.pricing_details: Warranty: Standard 5-year warranty against manufacturing defects
rfps.evaluation_criteria: Technical Compliance: Mandatory Delivery Capability: Required Price Weightage: 40% Certification: BIS mandatory After-Sales Support: years
